Newcastle. (2)  Homefront  Trading  26CC  (Reg.  No.  2006/041818/23).  (3)  Cash  Crusaders  Newcastle,  22  Voortrekker
Street, Fruit & Veg City Centre, Newcastle. (4) Sale of business. (5) Coenraad Jacobus van der Merwe (ID No. 6808215002080)
in his capacity as a trustee for a company to be formed. (6) —. (7) Ashersons Attorneys, Ashersons Chambers, 34 Plein Street,
Cape Town, (021) 461-6240.

In the ex parteapplication of: TEAK FROM AFRICA CC (Reg. No. 2006/134568/23),
Sunset Village 30, Braford Street, Highveld, Centurion, Applicant
Having heard counsel for the Applicant and having read the notice of motion and other documents filed of record:
1. That the Applicant be and is hereby placed under provisional liquidation in the hands of the Master of the above Court.
2. That a rule nisi be issued, calling upon all interested parties to show cause on 24 April 2014 why this Court should not
grant a final liquidation of the Applicant.

KENNISGEWING VAN ’N VERGADERING VAN LEDE GEHOU KRAGTENS ARTIKEL 386 (1) VAN DIE
MAATSKAPPYWET EN REGULASIE 8 (1) VAN BYLAE III VAN DIE MAATSKAPPYEWET
REVOLUTION BUSINESS SOLUTIONS (EDMS) BPK (in likwidasie)
GEREGISTREERDE ADRES: PRETORIUSSTRAAT 1011, LYTTELTON MANOR, PRETORIA
(Registrasie No. 2006/017140/07)
(Meestersverwysing: T4117/11)
Kragtens  artikel  386  (4)  geskied  kennis  hiermee  dat  ’n  vergadering  van  lede  van  bogemelde  Maatskappy  in  likwidasie
gehou sal word voor die Meester van die Hooggeregshof, Pretoria, Donderdag, 23 Oktober 2014 om 10h00.
Die doel van die vergadering is om die magte soos vervat in artikel 386 (4) van die Maatskappyewet aan die Likwidateur
te verleen.
Johannes Jurie Beetge & Tracy Hill, Mede-Likwidateurs, Tshwane Trust Co (Edms) Bpk, Cobhamweg 1207, Queenswood,
Pretoria, 0186.
T4117/11—(2) Revolution Business Solutions (Pty Ltd  (2006/017140/07) (In Liquidation), (3) First and Final Liquidation
& Contribution Account; (4) Pretoria; None
T4117/11—(2) Revolution Business Solutions (Pty) Ltd (2006/017140/07) (In Liquidation); (3) First & Final Liquidation &
Contribution Account; (4) 5 October 2015; (5) Contributions are being collected; (6) J J Beetge & T Hill, Tshwane Trust Co (Pty)
Ltd, 1207 Cobham Road, Queenswood, Pretoria.
KENNISGEWING VAN ’N VERGADERING VAN LEDE GEHOU KRAGTENS ARTIKEL 386 (1) VAN DIE
MAATSKAPPYWET EN REGULASIE 8 (1) VAN BYLAE III VAN DIE MAATSKAPPYEWET
REVOLUTION BUSINESS SOLUTIONS (EDMS) BPK (IN LIKWIDASIE)
GEREGISTREERDE ADRES: PRETORIUSSTRAAT 1011, LYTTELTON MANOR, PRETORIA
(Registrasie No. 2006/017140/07)
(Meestersverwysing T4117/11)
Kragtens artikel 386 (4) geskied kennis hiermee dat ’n vergadering van lede van bogemelde Maatskappy in Likwidasie
gehou sal word voor die Meester van die Hooggeregshof, Pretoria, op Donderdag, 18 September 2014 om 10h00.
Die doel van die vergardering is om die magte soos vervat in artikel 386 (4) van die maatskappyewet aan die Likwidateur
te verleen.
Johannes Jurie Beetge & Tracy Hill, Mede Likwidateurs, Tshwane Trust Co (Edms) Bpk, Cobhamweg 1207, Queenswood,
Pretoria, 0186.

Queenswood, Pretoria, 0186. Donderdag, 18 September 2014 om 10:00, Meester van die Hooggeregshof, Pretoria.
